_header: Saint Damas the pope was I-bore in Spain
Subjects: saints’ lives; Damas, pope, life of
_description: Life of Pope Damas in one MS of the South English Legendary — couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Seint damas þe pope was I bore in spayneþe whil he was a
                    ȝong child he liste nouȝt to playne…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…nowe prey we to Ihesu crist þat is so fre &
                    hendeWhan we partiþ of þis world let vs to oure soules
                    to heuene wende
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 407-8.
